t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I see that you're going to go up and meet my mother.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You can see my intentions. I don't need to be told about this. Let me talk with her, please.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Sorry, but she's not going to meet with you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you continue blocking me, you're screwed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: All she'll do is double the length of your hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Not letting me pass means you'll get another round of danmaku to the face!
